src:
Komphela Sporting Blond Hair Is The Best Thing You'll See Today
05 Nov 2019, 11:59 by SL Social
Known to be a well-dressed individual off the pitch, a video of Steve Komphela sporting a blond head of hair recently made the rounds on social media. Check it out!
When you think of Komphela, you think of a football figure who always makes it his aim to be presentable to the public. Whether it be through his dress code or spoken word, Komphela is as "proper" as it comes.

Download The Soccer Laduma Social Media App & Earn Airtime for Selfies

Nonetheless, fans were treated to a rare glimpse of "Jola" looking anything but the formal figure he usually is when a video of him sporting blond hair surfaced on social media.
In what appears to be an old clip, fans lightheartedly responded to the sight of Komphela with blond hair.

Check it out!





What do you think of Komphela's blond look?
